data.actual_result: You're unable to select multiple files, as if you lack permission to override the Slow Mode
data.expected_result: You should be able to select multiple files to upload as you have permission to override the Slow Mode
data.short_description: Cannot select multiple files to upload in a Slow Mode channel when you have permission to override it
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Manage Channel permission in a server - Enable Slow Mode in a channel in the server - Click the plus icon to open the File Explorer - Attempt to left click drag to highlight multiple files and observe
